output.name: CrimsonEchoFox
output.description: CrimsonEchoFox is a voice, video, and text platform revolutionizing how friends connect while gaming. Founded in 2015 by Jason Citron and Stanislav Vishnevskiy, the company recognized the potential of multiplayer gaming as the future of entertainment. With a unique focus on enhancing user communication through direct messages, group chats, and servers, CrimsonEchoFox boasts a seamless experience for users to interact and play together as if in the same room. With over 200 million monthly users, CrimsonEchoFox is dedicated to making gaming social, fun, and engaging.
